page.title: 08A TYPICAL FARM (continued)
page.content: The machinery consists of: 5 tractors suited to different jobs, 1 combine harvester,a combridge and a flat surfaced roller, chain harrows, seed and cultivating disc harrows,seed drill,crop sprayer,fertilizer spreader 2 silage trailers,forage harvester,2 mowers, 5 other trailers and 2 dung spreaders. Silage is cut to provide economical and nourishing fodder for livestock. 50% of the straw baled is of the new large round type bales. On the farm Mrs Berry does all the paperwork side, Mr Berry and his son work full_time, there is one tractor driver and a cowman who works mornings and nights.
